transcription: And I do care of our Kangan restaurant. So here we have got a brand of Indian restaurant throughout the chain in the western and that's known as Kangan. At present we have got Kangan at Hyderabad, Kangan at Mumbai and at Pune. For the first time we are coming up with a kind of drive where we want to  have a synergy in all the three restaurants which are specialized in Northwest country cuisine. So what we have come up with an idea that from all the three, Hyderabad, Mumbai and Pune, we have taken the strength of all the places based upon the specialty and here we started with Pune for two weeks we had a very good response and now we started here on 7th and it's going on to the, sorry on 5th and it's going on to the 18th and then we'll move to Mumbai. For Mumbai  Western and once we are done with all the three promotion will come up with a menu and They would be around 30 to 40 percent of dishes which will be common throughout the chain Which known as our signature dishes in terms of a plate presentation in terms of recipes? Everything is similar for us for a guest who is traveling from one West to another they will have a same taste same presentation so that's the whole idea and the same time that the kind of Cuisine we have the kind of expertise we have in all the three areas with Pune Mumbai in Hyderabad we want to encash the strength of  of that and I want to bring in front of our customer that how different we are even in being an Indian restaurant how different we are from an our restaurant next door. So this in comparison lots of R&D what we have done and before we launch this menu we had a workshop at Mumbai and Pune and after lots of food tasting and now we have come up with a enormous menu for around 48 dishes and I trust you'll enjoy it.  you
